title: Study for "March 1988-He Tried to Carry Something too Large, He Felt Like He was Falling," from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
description: Man in a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he drags a heavy object behind him while he walks; the words \"He tried to carry something/too big.  He felt like he would fall.\" scrawled in UR quadrant
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
